level.heading: Hoisting machine operator license required.
level.text: ยง28-405.1 Hoisting machine operator license required. It shall be unlawful for any persons to take charge of or operate any power-operated hoisting machine used for hoisting purposes or cableways under the jurisdiction of the department, except power-operated scaffolds and window-washing machines, unless such person is licensed under the provisions of this article or is a holder of a certificate of qualification as a hoisting machine operator issued prior to December 6, 1968 and not allowed to lapse. Exceptions: 1. The commissioner may, by rule, exempt operators of mobile cranes of limited size and capacity from the requirements of this article. 2. The provisions of this article shall not apply to machines under one ton capacity.
